1590170.name: RPG Maker MV - Painterly Trees Asset Pack
1590170.description:
The Painterly Tree Asset Pack by Plueschkatze brings creators a lovely collection of expertly drawn trees for developing the landscape of your next RPG. Prepare to fill in your village with a beautiful collection of trees that range from tall, fully flourished greens that are perfect for spring or summer, along with a colorful collection that are brilliant for fall, and gorgeous pines that create the ideal setting for your winter time scenery. The collection of trees also include styles more fit for drier climates and those that appear lifeless.

The Painterly Tree Asset Pack is perfect for developing your world’s landscape to fit any type of atmosphere, from tree lines that project a darker tone of lifelessness to those that are far more enchanting. In addition to the five tree types each with multiple options in style comes 11 flooring options to place beside your trees as well. This pack is perfect for those looking to find a little bit of shade behind a tall tree or those looking to build a forest of wonder. Which of these trees speak the most to you?

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1590170.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
